data.eml:eml: A new polytypic species of the genus Uromastyx MERREM 1820 (Reptilia: Squamata: Agamidae: Leiolepidinae) from southwestern Arabia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Wilms, Thomas M., Schmitz, Andreas (2007): A new polytypic species of the genus Uromastyx MERREM 1820 (Reptilia: Squamata: Agamidae: Leiolepidinae) from southwestern Arabia. Zootaxa 1394: 1-23, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.175330
